document.body:
Home | Back
about us Order With Choice Of Meat Extras / Specials Downloads Contact Us Welcome
“Passion Food” is not just a statement, it’s Slow Food, Done Right, Served Fast! This is our way of Cooking. We commit ourselves to only using the freshest and finest ingredients and prepare them with care to bring you nothing but GREAT FOOD, VIBRANT DINING EXPERIENCE and GREAT VARIETY.
Order
Back to Top ^ With Choice Of Meat CHORIZO Homemade Mexican Sausages STEAK CARNE ASADA Marinated for hours in our garlic, ancho, citrus, marinade then grilled GRILLED CHICKEN Marinated for hours in jalapeno lemon-lime marinade then grilled. BARBACOA Shredded beef, slow braised for 6 hours with our own chipotle adobo, cumin, cloves garlic and oregano CARNITAS Organic pork seasoned with thyme, bay leaves, orange juice and freshly cracked black pepper seared then braised for four hours. AL PASTOR Thinly sliced organic pork, marinated in guajillo, ancho and chipotle peppers , spit roasted with sweet pineapple.
